doc.title: Riders of the Painted Desert
doc.plot: The story of Texan John Tunsten, a sharpshooter for the American army, who is left wounded and alone in the Chihuahuan Desert during the last days of the Mexican-American war. He encounters another survivor: Mexican soldier, Tomas Escamilla. Neither can speak the other's language and both hold hatred for the other side. In spite of their differences, the stranded soldiers form a bond and make an oath: they will get each other home to their families.
